### 01-- Kafka Topic

>mappoi-operation-log
>
>

|                      |               |             |
| -------------------- | ------------- | ----------- |
| Kafka Topic名        | 描述          | 所属模块    |
| mappoi-operation-log | 操作日志topic | Access      |
|                      |               | Standardize |
|                      |               | Distribute  |
|                      |               | Aggreate    |
